content: स्रु {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्रवति, स्रुत) {@--1@} To flow, stream, trickle, ooze, drop, exude; न हि निंबात्स्रवेत्क्षौद्रं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} To pour out, shed, let flow; अलोठिष्ट च भूपृष्ठे शोणितं चाप्यसुस्रुवत् <ls>Bk. 15. 56</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">17. 18.</ls> {@--3@} To go, move. {@--4@} To trickle or slip away, waste away, perish, come to nothing; स्रवते ब्रह्म तस्यापि भिन्नभांडात्पयो यथा <ls>Bhāg.</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 74.</ls> {@--5@} To spread about, get abroad, transpire (as a secret). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्रावयति-ते) To cause to flow, pour out, shed, spill (blood &c.); न गात्रात्स्रावयेदसृक् <ls>Ms. 4. 169.</ls>
